body:
Since #634 failed because of vote manipulation, we have to try again, this time using only GH stuff.

#### How to vote
- Use the üëç emoticon on comments to vote for a Topic. Other emoticons on comments will be ignored.
- I'll count the votes in a few days and produce stats.
- Adding new poll options is allowed by starting the comment with `POLL: <Topic>` and a short description will be allowed.
- No discussion allowed to keep this thread clean. Comments not adhering to the rules will be deleted!

comment_data.body: POLL: sent timestamps in messages (e.g. now faux offline msgs have "wrong" timestamps)
POLL: long term message IDs (to get message receipt even after offline or restart)
POLL: Decentralized persistence of contact list by key/memento phrase
So, multi device wins, and group chats are next. We're already working on group chats, so let's prioritise that.
NGC is first. We can re-do this poll at some point when we have at least rough plans for each of the other features, so we know whether it's feasible and how long it takes.

rename.from: [Question] What are the features that needs to be worked on first? Try 2
rename.to: [Question] What are the features that need to be worked on first? Try 2

title: [Question] What are the features that need to be worked on first? Try 2
